Parameter.name: RadiusSearch
Parameter.description: Radius of point search for normal estimation

Parameter.name: KSearch
Parameter.description: Number of neighbors to consider for normal estimation

Parameter.name: RadiusSearch
Parameter.description: Radius of point search for feature estimation

Parameter.name: KSearch
Parameter.description: Number of neighbors to consider for feature estimation

ParameterSet.name: Debugging
ParameterSet.description: Level of debugging output. 0 will prevent display of images. 1 will show images. 2 will pause images.

Parameter.name: DebuggingLevel
Parameter.description: Level of debugging output; 0 is lowest level
